title: Zone 0 Appliances and Other Electrical Equipment
fullText: Appliances or other items of electrical equipment installed in Zone 0 shall be supplied: (a) from an individual source installed outside Zone 0; NOTE: An individual source may be an individual isolation transformer or an individual winding on an isolation transformer having a number of secondary windings, provided that the output complies with Clause 7.5.3. (b) at a nominal voltage not exceeding 12 V a.c. or 30 V ripple-free d.c.; and (c) as an SELV or a PELV system, in accordance with Clause 7.5.
